original_text: That is why many people came to meet Jesus. They had heard that he had done this miracle.
korean_text: 이에 무리가 예수를 맞음은 이 표적 행하심을 들었음이러라

sentences.original_text: That is why many people came to meet Jesus.
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 많은 사람들이 예수님을 만나러 왔습니다.

sentences.original_text: that he had done this miracle.
